about_the_game:
Fight off the Aetheryx invasion in brutal, turn-based card battles across civilization's ruins. Choose your targets wisely as dice rolls and the luck of the draw determine attack damage. Master three unique classes, endure waves of enemies, and prepare to invade and destroy the Aetheryx Lair!

Features:

Simple and deep turn-based card battles:

Engage enemies in intense turn based battles inspired by JRPGs and minimalist game design, where you'll count on both your strategy and luck. Assess the biggest threats on the enemy team to choose your targets wisely, use your unit's special class abilities, and hope that luck is on your side!

Campaign with four game modes:

Command your troops across an apocalyptic landscape in four game modes that require you to master your strategic approach in battle. Patrol the City Ruins to learn the battle mechanics and unit classes. Engage friendly skirmishes with other academies to practice battling against full teams of evolved invaders. Fight off a daily onslaught of invading Aetheryx, and finally invade and destroy the Aetheryx Lair!

Local multiplayer:

Invite a friend to enjoy head-to-head skirmishes where you can enjoy the game's battle system against another human mind, using customizable rules, music, and visuals to choose your favorite aesthetics.

Achievements:

See all that the battle system has to offer while pursuing interesting challenges.
